segments.text: Hi , Vanessa . I ’ m Don . I ’ m calling from Seller ’ s Market . Are you still interested in a position as a cashier ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Is the position available now ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it is . Please come to see me tomorrow afternoon at 2 00 for a job interview .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You ’ re welcome . I ’ ll see you tomorrow at 2 00 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ ll see you then . Good bye .
segments.speaker: S2
